description: Try our easy to follow Kids' Chicken Noodle Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Jul 2020,Soy free,Chicken,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Kids' Chicken Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat. Add onion, carrot and celery and cook, stirring, for 10 minutes or until softened.
Meanwhile, fill food flasks with boiling water and set aside.

Add chicken, stock and 3 cups cold water to saucepan. Cover, bring to the boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes. Transfer chicken to a plate. Using 2 forks, shred chicken, then return to saucepan. Add noodles and spinach and cook, stirring, for a further 2 minutes or until spinach has just wilted and noodles are warmed through.
Drain water from flasks and dry well. Ladle in soup and serve.
